body:
Yea that makes sense. 
For all mismatched keys, actually after a second thought it still works with adding `continue`. I was thinking about eg. your are trying to copy {'weight':size(1,2), 'bias':(1,4)} to {'weight':size(2,2), 'bias':(2,4)}, the error message will have two lines listing both keys.
I will get another one liner to add the `continue`. Thanks! :D
